— Macarons —

Our Macarons

Our macarons are handcrafted locally in the Lower Mainland using all natural colours and flavours. We are always working on improving our craft, and our desire is to create for you the best macarons you’ve ever had. But it’s always better when you can use the words of customers.

What People Say

Flavours

Our flavours are always changing - but here are a few, to give you an idea.

  • Salted Caramel
  • Toasted Coconut
  • Espresso with Dark Chocolate Ganache
  • Pistachio
  • Vanilla Lavender
  • Rosemary Salted Caramel
  • Raspberry Lemon
  • Lemon Ginger
  • Green Tea (Jasmine)
  • Bacon Salted Caramel
  • Blueberry Lavender
  • Vanilla Bean
  • Chocolate Hazelnut
  • Peppermint with White Chocolate Ganache
  • Eggnog
  • ...

Ingredients

Almond flour, icing sugar (sugar, corn starch), egg whites, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, water, corn starch, natural flavor powders (dextrose, natural flavors), natural flavor extracts (water, ethyl alcohol, natural flavor), natural colors (including beet, turmeric, annatto, hibiscus, vegetable and plant extracts, tapioca dextrose, caramelized sugar).

Some flavours may also contain: chocolate (unsweetened chocolate, sugar, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, natural vanilla flavor), cream, coconut, lavender, coffee, tea, cocoa powder, lemon zest, vanilla (vanilla bean extractives, water, alcohol, sugar), vanilla beans, herbs, spices, salt.

Macaron Favours

People often ask us if we do macaron favours (e.g. 2pc boxes) for weddings or other special events (dinners, corporate, etc.). We create macarons for events like this all the time, and would be happy to help with your event. Just get in touch with us to let us know how we can help.

Where To Buy

Need Something Special?

We're always helping out with, birthdays, showers, weddings and corporate events. If you need something special - please get in touch and we'd love to help.

Get in touch

Macarons are like a tiny kiss, a promise, a jewel. When made with great care, their little bursts of flavor and texture have the power to transport you somewhere, wonderful, if only for a second. I thank you for that. A customer from our Hudson's Bay popup shop
